problemSets.title: Java Basics - Chapter 1
problemSets.description: Variables, data types, and basic operations

problemSets.title: Java Control Structures & Arrays - Chapter 2
problemSets.description: Conditionals, loops, arrays, and compound logic exercises based on Moe's Tavern theme

problemSets.title: Java Algorithms - Chapter 3
problemSets.description: Linear search, accumulators, basic functions, and algorithmic thinking exercises based on Pawnee Parks Department theme

problemSets.title: Java Functions - Chapter 4
problemSets.description: Function creation, parameters, return values, and string manipulation exercises based on Bob's Burgers theme

problemSets.title: Java Casting, Nulls, and 2D Arrays - Chapter 5
problemSets.description: Casting, null handling, 2D arrays, and built-in libraries exercises based on Springfield Elementary theme

problemSets.title: Java Collections - Chapter 6
problemSets.description: Dynamic data structures including ArrayList, LinkedList, HashSet, HashMap, and Collections utilities with music theme
